code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:{name:"lama",email:"lamadev@gmail.com"},reducers:{update:function update(state,action){state.name=action.payload.name;state.email=action.payload.email;},remove:function remove(state){return state={};},addHello:function addHello(state,action){state.name="Hello "+action.payload.name;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,update=_userSlice$actions.update,remove=_userSlice$actions.remove,addHello=_userSlice$actions.addHello;export{update,remove,addHello};export default userSlice.reducer;
